mapper.insert: insert into `user` (user_id, user_name, real_name, phone, gender, avatar, signature) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{avatar}, #{signature})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, real_name, phone, gender, avatar, signature, create_time, update_time from `user` where user_id = #{userId} and is_delete = 0
